title: 分发饼干 (Assign Cookies)
content: 思路: // @Title: 分发饼干 (Assign Cookies) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-22 00:45:27 // @Runtime: 8 ms // @Memory: 47.3 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int findContentChildren(int[] g, int[] s) { Arrays.sort(g);Arrays.sort(s); int s1=s.length-1; int result=0; for(int i=g.length-1;i>=0;i--){ if(s1<0){ break; } if(g[i]<=s[s1]){ s1--; result++; } } return result; } }
